requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A financial analyst who needs quick access to stock data for client presentations.
user_goal: To find information about a specific stock by entering its name or code.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the centered search bar. She wants to look up Apple Inc. and begins typing 'Apple' into the input field.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the search input field and type 'Apple'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search field is focused, and the placeholder disappears as she starts typing.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Search
narrative_steps.description: After typing 'Apple', Sarah expects suggestions to appear but decides to press Enter to perform a direct search.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the input and navigates to the results or displays relevant stock information if there's a match.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggest or autocomplete feature for stock search input
user_persona: An investor researching multiple stocks quickly during market hours.
user_goal: To efficiently locate stocks using partial inputs with suggested matches.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Input
narrative_steps.description: John visits the site and wants to check Amazon's stock. He clicks on the search bar and starts typing 'AMZN'.
narrative_steps.action: Click the search bar and type 'AMZN'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list of matching stocks appears below the input field.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Seeing 'AMZN - Amazon.com, Inc.' in the suggestions, John hovers over it and clicks to select.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the suggestion and click it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar populates with 'AMZN' and redirects to the stock detail page for Amazon.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company details and current price
user_persona: A day trader making rapid decisions based on current stock prices.
user_goal: To view essential company information and real-time pricing at a glance.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Stock Details
narrative_steps.description: Emily searches for Tesla and lands on its stock page where she looks for immediate insights.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Company logo, name, industry, sector, and exchange are displayed prominently.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Price
narrative_steps.description: She notices the current price and percentage change on the right side of the header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current price, absolute change, and percent change are shown with directional color coding (green/red).

requirement_tested: Show market trends visualization with charts or graphs
user_persona: A portfolio manager evaluating long-term investment opportunities.
user_goal: To analyze historical price movements through interactive visualizations.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Chart
narrative_steps.description: Michael selects Microsoft stock and scrolls down to the Market Trends section to see how it has performed recently.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the Market Trends chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A line chart showing Microsoft’s price movement over time is displayed with default 1-month view.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Time Range
narrative_steps.description: He wants to compare performance over different durations and clicks the '1Y' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to show one year of Microsoft’s price data.

requirement_tested: Present financial data section with key metrics and ratios
user_persona: A finance student studying fundamental analysis techniques.
user_goal: To understand a company's financial health through key metrics.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Financial Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Anna browses to Coca-Cola’s stock page and scrolls to the Financial Data section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the Financial Data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A two-column grid presents key metrics like P/E ratio, EPS, and Dividend Yield with labels and values.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Definitions
narrative_steps.description: Curious about what some terms mean, Anna hovers over the '?' icons next to each metric.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the tooltip icon beside a metric (e.g., ROE).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A small overlay box appears explaining the meaning or importance of Return on Equity.

requirement_tested: Offer customizable report format selection options
user_persona: A research associate preparing reports for internal review.
user_goal: To generate a report tailored to team preferences in preferred formats.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Format Selector
narrative_steps.description: David finishes configuring his report settings and now needs to choose an output format.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of available formats such as PDF, Word, Plain Text, and HTML appears.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Format
narrative_steps.description: He prefers sharing documents as Word files and selects that option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected format updates to Word, which will be applied during report generation.

requirement_tested: Allow users to select specific content sections for inclusion in reports
user_persona: A compliance officer needing only certain sections in formal documentation.
user_goal: To customize report contents by excluding unnecessary parts.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Sections
narrative_steps.description: Lisa reviews the content selection panel and sees all checkboxes checked by default.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All sections—Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data—are pre-checked.

narrative_steps.title: Excluding Sections
narrative_steps.description: Since her report doesn’t require analyst ratings, Lisa unchecks that section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: That section will not be included when the report is generated.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user selections
user_persona: A junior analyst tasked with generating weekly summaries for senior staff.
user_goal: To compile a custom report with selected data and format for distribution.

narrative_steps.title: Finalizing Preferences
narrative_steps.description: Tom finalizes his report configuration and clicks the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner appears indicating the report is being processed.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Report Link
narrative_steps.description: Once complete, he sees download links for various formats appear above the button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Download links for PDF, DOCX, TXT, and HTML become visible once generation finishes.

requirement_tested: Include export functionality for generated reports in multiple formats
user_persona: A marketing coordinator integrating stock insights into client newsletters.
user_goal: To obtain a version of the report suitable for embedding in web content.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Report
narrative_steps.description: Rachel configures her report and generates it successfully.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Multiple download links for different formats appear after processing completes.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading HTML Version
narrative_steps.description: For easy integration into her newsletter, Rachel downloads the HTML version.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser initiates an automatic download of the report in HTML format.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A UX designer reviewing competitor interfaces for inspiration.
user_goal: To evaluate the consistency and clarity of design implementation.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Overall Layout
narrative_steps.description: James accesses the homepage and immediately notices the minimalist aesthetic.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: White background dominates the layout with navy-colored headers, buttons, and borders.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Components
narrative_steps.description: He inspects various UI components like buttons and panels for visual coherence.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive components use consistent navy styling with clean white backgrounds.

requirement_tested: Provide real-time or latest available stock data updates
user_persona: A swing trader relying on accurate intraday price movements.
user_goal: To monitor continuously updated stock data without manual refreshes.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Updates
narrative_steps.description: Patricia loads Netflix’s stock page and watches the price update periodically.
narrative_steps.action: Stay on the stock details page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Prices and related metrics automatically refresh approximately every minute.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Timestamp
narrative_steps.description: She checks the 'Last Updated' timestamp near the top-right corner to confirm freshness.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: It reflects the most recent time data was fetched and updated on screen.

requirement_tested: Display historical price data and performance charts
user_persona: An equity researcher comparing long-term stock behaviors.
user_goal: To explore multi-year price patterns visually for pattern recognition.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Historical Tab
narrative_steps.description: Robert navigates to Google’s stock page and switches to the 'Historical Performance' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A candlestick chart showing years of Google’s price history is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Chart
narrative_steps.description: Using his mouse, Robert zooms into a specific period to study volatility spikes.
narrative_steps.action: Use mouse wheel to zoom into a selected interval.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart zooms in smoothly, allowing closer inspection of detailed price fluctuations.

requirement_tested: Include analyst recommendations and ratings section
user_persona: An institutional investor assessing expert sentiment before large trades.
user_goal: To review aggregated professional opinions influencing buy/sell decisions.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Analyst Section
narrative_steps.description: Margaret explores Intel’s stock page and locates the Analyst Recommendations panel.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the Analyst Recommendations section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table shows firm names, issued ratings, and target prices.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting Ratings
narrative_steps.description: She sorts the table by rating to see which firms recommend buying.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Entries reorder descending by rating strength (Buy > Hold > Sell).

requirement_tested: Show dividend information and corporate actions
user_persona: A retiree investing for steady income streams.
user_goal: To verify upcoming dividend payments and potential impacts from corporate events.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Income Section
narrative_steps.description: Harold views Johnson & Johnson’s stock page and clicks the 'Income & Events' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Two sub-tabs appear: 'Dividends' and 'Corporate Actions'.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Dividend Schedule
narrative_steps.description: He selects the 'Dividends' tab to see scheduled payouts and amounts per share.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table lists ex-dividend dates, payment dates, and dividend amounts clearly.

requirement_tested: Enable user authentication and profile management for saved reports
user_persona: A recurring visitor who saves frequently accessed reports.
user_goal: To securely manage personal reports and preferences through an account.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Susan clicks the 'Login' link in the top navigation and enters her credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authentication succeeds, redirecting her back to the previous page with her profile icon visible.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile
narrative_steps.description: Now logged in, Susan clicks her avatar to access her profile menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Menu options like 'Saved Reports' and 'Settings' are accessible.
